main.professionalSummary: A highly experienced professional with over a decade dedicated to web and mobile application development. Focused on creating highly efficient teams and designing robust architectures, resulting in the successful execution of numerous projects. Possesses profound knowledge in essential technologies, including Javascript, Node.js, React, Nestjs, Python, and Flask, along with expertise in databases such as MySQL and PostgreSQL, as well as cloud technologies like AWS. Adept at leading teams in an agile methodology environment, excelling in Scrum and Kanban. Skills encompass user interface design, API creation, and product development. Passionate about using technical expertise and problem-solving abilities to create products with a significant impact on people. The value proposition lies in the combination of technical skills with meticulous attention to the user experience, coupled with an understanding of business processes. Committed to continuous improvement, with a natural inclination for learning and teaching. The professional goal is to continue working in interdisciplinary teams, contributing while building relationships based on trust and respect.
skills: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, Elasticsearch, Neo4j

experience.title: Engineering Manager
responsibilities: Managed the development of 3-5 projects concurrently.
Led the creation of 3 mobile applications.
Established the development process and architecture.

experience.title: Senior Front End Developer
responsibilities: Created mobile applications in React Native.

responsibilities: Developed web applications in PHP and Node.js, including CRM-type solutions.
